sentences.en: Actions speak louder than words.
A picture is worth a thousand words.
When in Rome, do as the Romans do.
The early bird catches the worm.
Better late than never.
Two wrongs don't make a right.
The pen is mightier than the sword.
When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
No man is an island.
sentences.ko: 인간은 섬이 아니다. (혼자 살 수 없다)

sentences.en: Fortune favors the bold.
People who live in glass houses should not throw stones.
sentences.ko: 유리 집에 사는 사람은 돌을 던지지 말라.

sentences.en: Hope for the best, but prepare for the worst.
Birds of a feather flock together.
Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.
A penny saved is a penny earned.
sentences.ko: 한 푼 아끼면 한 푼 버는 것이다.

sentences.en: Necessity is the mother of invention.
Honesty is the best policy.
The grass is always greener on the other side.
Don't count your chickens before they hatch.
If you want something done right, do it yourself.
Practice makes perfect.
Too many cooks spoil the broth.
Easy come, easy go.
Don't put all your eggs in one basket.
sentences.ko: 한 바구니에 모든 달걀을 담지 마라.

sentences.en: What goes around comes around.
Two heads are better than one.
The squeaky wheel gets the grease.
You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs.
sentences.ko: 희생 없이 성과를 얻을 수 없다.

sentences.en: All good things must come to an end.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Time flies when you're having fun.
Knowledge is power.
Laughter is the best medicine.
Where there's smoke, there's fire.
Rome wasn't built in a day.
Look before you leap.
Beggars can't be choosers.
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
A stitch in time saves nine.
sentences.ko: 제때의 바늘 한 땀이 아홉 땀을 덜어준다.

sentences.en: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
sentences.ko: 하루에 사과 한 알이면 의사가 필요 없다.

sentences.en: Don't bite the hand that feeds you.
The best things in life are free.
You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it drink.
sentences.ko: 말을 물가에 데려갈 순 있어도 물을 먹일 순 없다.

sentences.en: Every cloud has a silver lining.
There's no place like home.
Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
You can't judge a book by its cover.
Curiosity killed the cat.
Don't cry over spilled milk.
Good things come to those who wait.
If it ain't broke, don't fix it.
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
You reap what you sow.
A watched pot never boils.
sentences.ko: 지켜보면 물이 안 끓는다. (조급해하면 일이 안 된다)

sentences.en: All that glitters is not gold.
Money doesn't grow on trees.
Haste makes waste.
There's no such thing as a free lunch.
Strike while the iron is hot.
The truth will set you free.
Life is what you make it.
Where there's a will, there's a way.
The road to hell is paved with good intentions.
sentences.ko: 지옥으로 가는 길은 선의로 포장되어 있다.

sentences.en: Love conquers all.
Time heals all wounds.
Slow and steady wins the race.
Blood is thicker than water.
Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
If you can't beat them, join them.
One man's trash is another man's treasure.
There's no time like the present.
Don't judge a man until you've walked a mile in his shoes.
sentences.ko: 그 사람 입장이 되어보기 전엔 판단하지 마라.

sentences.en: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
Out of sight, out of mind.
It takes two to tango.
The more things change, the more they stay the same.
Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today.
sentences.ko: 오늘 할 일을 내일로 미루지 마라.

sentences.en: What doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
A fool and his money are soon parted.
Every dog has its day.
Great minds think alike.
Ignorance is bliss.
It's always darkest before the dawn.
The best revenge is living well.
You catch more flies with honey than with vinegar.
sentences.ko: 식초보다 꿀로 더 많은 파리를 잡는다.

sentences.en: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
sentences.ko: 손 안의 새 한 마리가 덤불 속 두 마리보다 낫다.

sentences.en: Clean hands make a clean conscience.
Don't make a mountain out of a molehill.
Experience is the best teacher.
Failing to prepare is preparing to fail.
Half a loaf is better than none.
If the shoe fits, wear it.
Jack of all trades, master of none.
Keep your chin up.
Let sleeping dogs lie.
Make hay while the sun shines.
sentences.ko: 해가 날 때 건초를 만들어라. (기회를 놓치지 마라)

sentences.en: Never say never.
Old habits die hard.
Patience is a virtue.
The best laid plans of mice and men often go awry.
sentences.ko: 아무리 잘 세운 계획도 어긋날 수 있다.
